abstract: BP, posting quarterly earnings of $5.4 billion, said it was raising its quarterly dividend by more than 12 percent, to 14.4 cents a share.
snippet: BP, posting quarterly earnings of $5.4 billion, said it was raising its quarterly dividend by more than 12 percent, to 14.4 cents a share.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The oil giant BP returned to profitability with a better-than-expected third-quarter profit, prompting it to raise its dividend.

headline.main: BP Returns to Profitability and Plans to Raise Its Dividend
headline.print_headline: BP Returns to Profitability and Plans to Raise Its Dividend
